code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Contact.css';import emailjs from'@emailjs/browser';import{useRef}from'react';import{themeContest}from'../../Context';import{useContext}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contact=()=>{const theme=useContext(themeContest);const darkMode=theme.state.darkMode;const form=useRef();const[done,setDone]=useState(false);const sendEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('service_xo3rb4t','template_mo6lwty',form.current,'kqsrdQIiT-yCVVnxI').then(result=>{console.log(result.text);setDone(true);},error=>{console.log(error.text);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"awesome",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:darkMode?'white':''},children:"Get in touch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Contact me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blur s-blur1",style:{background:"#ABF1FF94"}})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"c-right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",className:"user",placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"user_email",className:"user",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",className:"user",placeholder:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"send",className:"button"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:done&&"Thanks For Contacting me!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blur c-blur1",style:{background:"var(--purple)"}})]})})]});};export default Contact;
